channel.title: Help plz?
channel.description:
i recently made my first server so i'm so nooby at this.. my server is running and everythin worked.. but my question is how do i edit my stats ty i also downloaded a source called ultimate pk.. when i compiled and ran my server is said pimpscape is running? one more thing.. i edited the source name in the files... i closed the server and then ran it again and it still says welcome to ultimate pk scape...
~~~~apple pie~~~~

item.title: Help plz?
item.dc:creator: @pkiller pkiller
item.description:
@pkiller wrote:

open your folder press ctrl+f in serch box look all files and folder put your user in serch in one of those
will have your stats change them all to 99 and 14000000 xp

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz?

item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

Search for “welcome to ultimate pk” and it’ll come up a few times… because there will be like 3 because there are 3 player rights… well usually so make sure you change all of them.

item.title: Help plz?
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

PimpScape or TestScape?

For Pimp, go to characters (the file), find your profile name/file, and enter it.
Change the “character-rights = 0” to “character-rights = 3”. Go down and you’ll see [SKILLS]. Under it are the skills, then level, then EXP for it… you can change it, the first number is the skill ID, second is level of it, 3rd the EXP… list is here.

[code]public int playerAttack = 0;
public int playerDefence = 1;
public int playerStrength = 2;
public int playerHitpoints = 3;
public int playerRanged = 4;
public int playerPrayer = 5;
public int playerMagic = 6;
public int playerCooking = 7;
public int playerWoodcutting = 8;
public int playerFletching = 9;
public int playerFishing = 10;
public int playerFiremaking = 11;
public int playerCrafting = 12;
public int playerSmithing = 13;
public int playerMining = 14;
public int playerHerblore = 15;
public int playerAgility = 16;
public int playerThieving = 17;
public int playerSlayer = 18;
public int playerFarming = 19;
public int playerRunecrafting = 20;[/code]

Read full topic
